comment: This student accommodation is just walking distance from RMIT University and The University of Melbourne. Which is really great especially for the convenience of the students who have to juggle a lot of different things during their Uni time.
name: Melisa

comment: The city centre is only close to 10 minutes away from this student housing option so you can easily grab a quick bite or shop around and maybe even see some of the local attractions that this place has to offer.
name: Rosa

comment: This student accommodation gives you the option to select from a wide range of well-furnished apartments so that you can make a better choice depending on several factors such as finance and individual preferences.
name: Paul
